ygData.subject: Is there a mechanic in the house?
ygData.msgSnippet: OH good it s no longer just me and logo consistently at the Ark. By the way how d Spears suddenly get stuck with command? Hopefully someone brought a mechanic

OH good it's no longer just me and logo consistently at the Ark. By 
the way how'd Spears suddenly get stuck with command?
Hopefully someone brought a mechanic into this game.
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (I don't know EXACTLY what happened to my other chars, but I am 
> assuming that they brought back the pods with Ramulus to the Ark, 
and 
> are now helping Ramulus, Spears, Wolveritron and everyone else re-
> pairing the Ark. Is that okay? Good.)
> 
> Bronco was going through the pods to find things that could e 
useful 
> when rebuilding The Ark, when Fliq bursted in.
> 
> "Yahooooo!!!!!!!! It's been days and I'm still obsessed with this 
new 
> beast mode. So watcha doin'?"
> 
> "Working. If you don't mind, you can help me find useful parts."
> 
> "Screw that! I've got an idea, which will give us all the 
equipement 
> we need! Follow me!"
> 
> Bronco follwed Octociz(Fliq! Gotta remember that now, he thought) 
to 
> his quarters, where he showed him the scamatics for his idea.
> 
> "Okay, look. This whole area is covered in debris that came off 
when 
> The Ark crashed. Nobody bothered to pick it up because it's debris. 
> But it's strong enough to stand the pressures of leaving and 
> enetering atmospheres. So we gather it up. Hold that for a second. 
So 
> now we take two transport pods, and add extensions, and connectors, 
> until it's one. Except it's got more room, can fit two people now, 
> and has twice the engines, which can make it fast enough to reach 
the 
> atmosphere. Now we take the metal we collected, adn patch it on. 
Now 
> it's strong enough to handle the burning. Now we can take her too 
the 
> moon, and collect useful items from the wreckage of our ship. That 
> was so huge, we could bring back stuff that would not only repar 
the 
> Ark, but make it bigger and better. It's going to be a bumby ride, 
> because this metal is just barely strong enough by my readings, but 
I 
> think it should work. What do you say?"
> 
> "Great! The stuff up there would make The Ark so strong. Let's go 
> talk it over with Spears."
> 
> The two bots set off to find Spears.
> 
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> 
> Vulois looked at Windrazor. This bot cannot be for peace?
> 
> "I will not except that. Go rage war on your own, if you must, but 
I  
> will not be a part of it. If things get ugly, than I will decide 
how 
> to handle it. But if you are here to attack The Alliance, than 
leave 
> me, and do not return until you now what matters. What will it be?"
